archimate:Requirement.name: 4.43.2 Virtual instance hypervisor configuration control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Hypervisors should be configured to: segregate virtual servers according to the confidentiality requirements of in-formation they process logically separate each virtual server to prevent information being trans-ferred between discrete environ-ments encrypt communications between vir-tual servers (e.g. using Transport Lay-er Security (TLS), IPsec, or equivalent) restrict access to a limited number of authorised individuals (e.g. hypervisor administrators) who are capable of creating virtual servers and making changes to them correctly and secure-ly segregate the roles of hypervisor ad-ministrators (for multiple virtual serv-ers).
